meta.description: Optimize the number of patients vaccinated with pill and shot vaccines under time and ratio constraints.

sets.name: VACCINES
sets.description: Types of vaccines available at the clinic.

params.name: time_per_vaccine
params.description: Time in minutes required to administer each type of vaccine.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of vaccine administered.

objective.name: max_total_vaccinations
objective.description: Maximize the total number of patients vaccinated.

constraints.name: time_constraint
constraints.description: Total time for administering vaccines must not exceed 10000 minutes.

constraints.name: shot_to_pill_ratio
constraints.description: The number of shots must be at least three times the number of pills.

constraints.name: min_pill_vaccines
constraints.description: At least 30 pill vaccines must be administered.
